title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.375 - Service lines: plastic
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.375 - Service lines: plastic

State Regulations
(a) Each
plastic service outside a building must be installed below ground level, except
that: (1)
it may be installed in accordance
with section
255.321
(l) of
this Part; and
(2)
it may terminate
above ground level and outside the building if: (i) the aboveground part of the plastic
service line is protected against deterioration and external damage. (ii)
the plastic service line is not used to
support external loads. (b) Each plastic service line inside a
building must be protected against external damage and must not be
exposed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.375

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
